code: import React from"react";import"../../../styles/product-card.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{cartActions}from"../../../store/shopping-cart/cartSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=props=>{const{id,title,image01,price}=props.item;const dispatch=useDispatch();const addToCart=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.addItem({id,title,image01,price}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product__img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image01,alt:"product-img",className:"w-50"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/foods/".concat(id),children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"product__price",children:["$",price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addTOCart__btn",onClick:addToCart,children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
